p: This present study demonstrated the effectiveness of carbopol based herbal gels containing methanol extracts of Chasmanthera dependens and Chenopodium ambrosioides leaves in inhibiting COX-2 enzymes, PGE-2 mediators, IL-10 and TNF Î± inflammatory cytokines. Thus, the formulated individual and polyherbal gels incorporated with Chasmanthera dependens and Chenopodium ambrosioides extracts show great promises in the management of pain and inflammation.
